column1: Little Goat Diner////Even for Sunday brunch
column2: I think we lucked out because we didn't have to wait any more than 15 minutes. We even scored our own booth! Nothing against the communal tables
column3: but it's awkward sitting next to your dining partner and if you sit across from them
column4: you're subjected to everyone's conversations. Since I was catching up with a friend
column5: I was really grateful for our table.
